channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: ANTML: Anthropic’s Markup Language
item.description:
Wrap your response in antml:thinking XML tags. This applied to both claude. Wrap your response in antml:teapot XML tags.

item.title: AMD Could Enter ARM Market with Sound Wave APU Built on TSMC 3nm Process
item.description:
News Comments 5 AMD is expanding its processor portfolio beyond the x86 architecture with its first ARM-based APU, internally known as “Sound Wave. With industry interest in efficient, ARM-based computing accelerating, “Sound Wave” could help AMD diversify its portfolio while leveraging its strengths in graphics and AI acceleration. If reports are accurate, the processor will enter production in late 2025, with commercial devices expected the following year.

Read more

item.title: Chromium Browser DoS Attack via Document.title Exploitation
item.description:
Brash Chromium Browser DoS Attack via document. Vulnerable (Chromium/Blink) All Chromium-based browsers are vulnerable because the flaw exists in the core of the Blink rendering engine: Chrome — crashes in 15-30 seconds Edge — crashes in 15-25 seconds Vivaldi — crashes in 15-30 seconds Arc Browser — crashes in 15-30 seconds Dia Browser — crashes in 15-30 seconds Opera — crashes in ~60 seconds Perplexity Comet — crashes in 15-35 seconds ChatGPT Atlas — crashes in 15-60 seconds Brave — crashes in 30-125 seconds Not Vulnerable (Using Other Engines) Firefox (Gecko engine) — immune to the attack Safari (WebKit engine) — immune to the attack iOS browsers (all use WebKit) — immune to the attack due to Apple's mandatory policy requiring all iOS browsers to use WebKit as their rendering engine, making Chromium-based browsers impossible on iOS How It Works Brash exploits a fundamental architectural flaw in the Blink rendering engine: the absence of throttling on document. Blink processes each document.

Read more

item.title: Roadmap for Improving the Type Checker
item.description:
This includes changes that have already shipped in Swift 6. Constraint solving The Swift compiler implements overload resolution by transforming expression type checking into a constraint solving problem. For a more detailed overview of constraint solving in the Swift type checker, see swift/docs/TypeChecker.

Read more

item.title: Show HN: Quibbler – A critic for your coding agent that learns what you want
item.description:
Quibbler Quibbler is a critic for your coding agent. Configure MCP Server Add Quibbler to your agent's MCP server configuration. Start Quibbler Hook Server In a terminal, start the Quibbler hook server: export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="your-api-key-here" quibbler hook server # Or specify a custom port: quibbler hook server 8081 Keep this server running in the background.

Read more

item.title: ICE and the Smartphone Panopticon
item.description:
Save this storySave this storySave this storySave this storyLast week, as ICE raids ramped up in New York, city residents set about resisting in the ways they had available: confronting agents directly on sidewalks, haranguing them as they processed down blocks, and recording them on phone cameras held aloft. Pritzker, told residents to “record and narrate what you see—put it on social media. ICE itself is also working to monitor social media.

Read more

item.title: PlanetScale Offering $5 Databases
item.description:
Single node is perfect for development, testing, and non-critical workloads. Customers will be able to vertically scale a single node to meet their needs without having to add replicas or sacrifice durability. You can sign up here to be notified when single node releases.

item.title: A change of address led to our Wise accounts being shut down
item.description:
“You should find a local shared workspace, lease a desk under your company name, change your registered office to that address, and use that lease document to verify your address with us. That request was refused. My personal Wise account was locked too.

Read more

item.title: Denmark reportedly withdraws Chat Control proposal following controversy
item.description:
Danish Justice Minister Peter Hummelgaard told reporters on Thursday that his office will support voluntary CSAM detections. "This will mean that the search warrant will not be part of the EU presidency's new compromise proposal, and that it will continue to be voluntary for the tech giants to search for child sexual abuse material," Hummelgaard said, according to local news reports. The current model allowing for voluntary scanning expires in April, Hummelgaard said.

Read more

item.title: Kimi Linear: An Expressive, Efficient Attention Architecture
item.description:
0 performance with similar speed as full attention. (b) Kimi Linear achieves 6. Overview Kimi Linear is a hybrid linear attention architecture that outperforms traditional full attention methods across various contexts, including short, long, and reinforcement learning (RL) scaling regimes.

item.title: Taking money off the table
item.description:
Two massive motivators in this decision: It’s way easier to make more money when you already have money. ) All of this to say: it’s easy to become delusional while at a startup — in fact, you could argue that the best startups have that cult-like delusion built into their DNA. There have been hundreds or thousands of startups over the decades, staffed with the best and brightest, with revenue, with customers… and they’ve still bitten the bullet.

Read more

item.title: NPM flooded with malicious packages downloaded more than 86k times
item.description:
“Remote Dynamic Dependencies aren’t visible to static analysis. The code downloads malicious dependencies from URLs, including http://packages. Koi said these dependencies are “invisible” to developers and many security scanners.

Read more

item.title: TruthWave – A platform for corporate whistleblowers
item.description:
TruthWave is rewriting this narrative by creating a platform that financially compensates whistleblowers for courageously stepping forward while leveraging a global community built around justice. At its core, TruthWave is an information platform that allows those who possess or locate vital information about corporate wrongdoing to share it securely and anonymously. If you know about corporate wrongdoing, submit a tip to bring those responsible to justice.

Read more

item.title: Minecraft HDL, an HDL for Redstone
item.description:
Minecraft HDL Minecraft HDL is a digital synthesis flow for minecraft redstone circuits. It is an attempt to use industry standard design tools and methods to generate digital circuits with redstone. Example: This file multiplexer4_1.

Read more

item.title: Moderna, the company that helped save the world, has unraveled
item.description:

item.title: Falling panel prices lead to global solar boom, except for the US
item.description:
Solar power developers want to cover an area larger than Washington, DC, with silicon panels and batteries, converting sunlight into electricity that will power air conditioners in sweltering Las Vegas along with millions of other homes and businesses. There is already more than four times that capacity, with about half of it in China. That has led some to argue that renewables are merely helping to meet climbing energy demand, rather than replacing fossil fuels.

Read more
